casebody.data:
Katrina Letress GRIFFIS
v.
Patricia Joyce LAZAROVICH and John Edward Lazarovich, and Cassandra Michelle Leak. No. 38P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. E. Gregory Stott, Raleigh, for Griffis. Dayatra T. King, Raleigh, for Lazarovichs. Jonathan E. Hall, Raleigh, Kathleen M. Millikan, Durham, for Leak.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of January 2004 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of May 2004."
